CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . Dismissed from the civil service , the applicant brought an action against ORG in DATE . He sought reinstatement and compensation .
CARDINAL . After several hearings , on DATE ORG partly found for him . On DATE ORG dismissed his appeal . On DATE ORG dismissed his petition for review .
